```markdown
# TBIPS myEMS (SAP) Solution - Support Services

## Solicitation Overview

* Solicitation Number: G9292-248331/B
* Publication Date: 2022-09-14
* Closing Date: 2022-10-17T14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 2

## Description

The Government of Canada, represented by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is seeking a supplier to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement method of supply. The requirement is for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) to have access to informatics professional services on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Requirements

The following resource categories are required:

* A.1 Application/Software Architect - SAP (Level 3)
* A.2 ERP Functional Analyst - SAP - Generalist (Level 3)
* A.2 ERP Functional Analyst - SAP - Salary Management (Level 3)
* A.2 ERP Functional Analyst - SAP - Funds Management (Level 3)
* B.9 Courseware Developer - SAP - Training Documentation and Delivery (Level 3)
* P.1 Change Management Consultant - SAP - Organizational Change Management (Level 3)
* P.1 Change Management Consultant - SAP - Release Management (Level 3)
* P.9 Project Manager - SAP (Level 3)

## Contract Period

At the sole discretion of Canada, up to two contracts may be awarded, each for three years plus two one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

## Current Incumbent

Three incumbents are listed:

* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* S.I. Systems

## Electronic Transmission of Bid

Bidders can utilize the Canada Post's CPC Connect service to transmit their bid electronically.

## Security and Accessibly Requirements

* Valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) for Bidders
* Reliability Status for Resources
* Accessibility is an obligation in the Treasury Board Contracting Policy

## Contact Information

Nataliya Sekret (contactor)
Phone: (343) 551-1763
Email: nataliya.sekret@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
```
